title: Wolverine Confidential : Who replaces Juwan Howard ? Names to consider
body_text:
All eyes are on Michigan athletic director Warde Manuel and his search for a new men’s basketball coach after Juwan Howard was let go on Friday.
On the latest episode of the “Wolverine Confidential” podcast, MLive’s Andrew Kahn, Aaron McMann and Ryan Zuke discuss potential candidates, the timing of Howard’s dismissal and where Michigan goes from here. They also preview the women’s basketball team’s NCAA tournament draw.
There’s also plenty going on with the football team. First-year coach Sherrone Moore plucked assistant coach Tony Alford from arch rival Ohio State, then his new defensive line coach (Greg Scruggs) was arrested over the weekend in Ann Arbor for drunk driving. What happens next?
Plus, the guys recap another victory for Michigan hockey and preview the team’s pending Big Ten championship game against in-state rival Michigan State.
To listen to the latest podcast, a loaded one that spans nearly 45 minutes, click the embedded player below (click here if you’re unable to see it) or search for us on your preferred podcasting platform.
